definition.name: Deploy GitHub Pages site
definition.description: A GitHub Action to deploy an artifact as a GitHub Pages site
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.description: Time in milliseconds after which to timeout and cancel the deployment (default: 10 minutes)

inputs.name: error_count
inputs.description: Maximum number of status report errors before cancelling a deployment (default: 10)

inputs.name: reporting_interval
inputs.description: Time in milliseconds between two deployment status report (default: 5 seconds)

inputs.name: artifact_name
inputs.description: Name of the artifact to deploy

inputs.name: preview
inputs.description: Is this attempting to deploy a pull request as a GitHub Pages preview site? (NOTE: This feature is only in alpha currently and is not available to the public!)
